entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
